mapper.sql: t.city_code, t.zoom_level, t.longitude_gaode, t.latitude_gaode, t.longitude_baidu, t.latitude_baidu, t.extend_center_longitude_gaode, t.extend_center_latitude_gaode, t.extend_center_longitude_baidu, t.extend_center_latitude_baidu, t.park_count, t.flag, t.create_time, t.update_time, t.park_id, t.park_type, t.id
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() as ID
insert into APP_PARK_AGGREGATION
city_code,
zoom_level,
longitude_gaode,
latitude_gaode,
longitude_baidu,
latitude_baidu,
extend_center_longitude_gaode,
extend_center_latitude_gaode,
extend_center_longitude_baidu,
extend_center_latitude_baidu,
park_count,
flag,
create_time,
update_time,
values
#{cityCode},
#{zoomLevel},
#{longitudeGaode},
#{latitudeGaode},
#{longitudeBaidu},
#{latitudeBaidu},
#{extendCenterLongitudeGaode},
#{extendCenterLatitudeGaode},
#{extendCenterLongitudeBaidu},
#{extendCenterLatitudeBaidu},
#{parkCount},
#{flag},
#{createTime},
#{updateTime},
mapper.update:
update APP_PARK_AGGREGATION t set
t.city_code = #{cityCode},
t.zoom_level = #{zoomLevel},
t.longitude_gaode = #{longitudeGaode},
t.latitude_gaode = #{latitudeGaode},
t.longitude_baidu = #{longitudeBaidu},
t.latitude_baidu = #{latitudeBaidu},
t.extend_center_longitude_gaode = #{extendCenterLongitudeGaode},
t.extend_center_latitude_gaode = #{extendCenterLatitudeGaode},
t.extend_center_longitude_baidu = #{extendCenterLongitudeBaidu},
t.extend_center_latitude_baidu = #{extendCenterLatitudeBaidu},
t.park_count = #{parkCount},
t.flag = #{flag},
t.create_time = #{createTime},
t.update_time = #{updateTime},
where t.id= #{id}
mapper.select: select from APP_PARK_AGGREGATION t where t.id = #{id}

select t.city_code, t.zoom_level, t.longitude_gaode, t.latitude_gaode, t.longitude_baidu, t.latitude_baidu, t.extend_center_longitude_gaode, t.extend_center_latitude_gaode, t.extend_center_longitude_baidu, t.extend_center_latitude_baidu, t.park_count, t.flag, t.create_time, t.update_time, t.park_id, t.park_type,
IFNULL(t.total_berth_num,0) total_berth_num, IFNULL(fl.available_berth_num,-1) available_berth_num, IFNULL(fl.bookable_num,0) bookable_num, IFNULL(t.MIN_RATE,-1) MIN_RATE, t.id from APP_PARK_AGGREGATION t left join APP_PARK_FLOW fl on fl.PARK_ID=t.park_id and fl.FLAG!='DELETE'
mapper.sql: ba.area_name, t.city_code, t.zoom_level, t.longitude_gaode, t.latitude_gaode, t.longitude_baidu, t.latitude_baidu, t.extend_center_longitude_gaode, t.extend_center_latitude_gaode, t.extend_center_longitude_baidu, t.extend_center_latitude_baidu, t.park_count, t.flag, t.create_time, t.update_time, t.park_id, t.park_type, t.id
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) FROM APP_PARK_AGGREGATION t LEFT JOIN BASE_AREA ba ON t.city_code = ba.area_code

SELECT
FROM APP_PARK_AGGREGATION t LEFT JOIN BASE_AREA ba ON t.city_code = ba.area_code where 1=1 and t.id = #{id}
